greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A symmetric square array of numbers, read by antidiagonals.
comment: Rows include A028872, A082109. Main diagonal is A082106. Other diagonals include A047673. Diagonal sums (row sums if viewed as number triangle) are A082107
formula: Square array defined by T(n, k)=(k^2n^2+4kn+1)
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Apr 03 2003
